author: gdaniels
msg: Place for sessions to live in the MessageContext.
Session-aware Handlers or Listeners will drop an appropriate implementation
in, and then everyone else uses the abstract interface.

author: gdaniels
msg: Session is a base class which provides a simple interface to getting and
setting properties in a session context.  SimpleSession is a trivial
implementation of this with a Hashtable representation.
See next couple of changes for a little more related to this, though Rob
will be doing the work of actually hooking this into a working form.

author: gdaniels
msg: Modify Message to get rid of the getAs() method.  Everything is now type-safe
and we support six potential "forms".  This may continue to change in the
future but for now this should be faster and less error prone.  This change
caused a lot of files to require editing, so this is a large checkin.
Also started setting up some changes to the SAX handling/deser system.

author: rubys
msg: Performance improvements: reduce the numbers of hashtables created,
and the number of calls to "contains".

author: rubys
msg: The assumption that localName == tagName for un-namespace qualified
elements does not appear to hold across parser implementations.  The
updated code works with Crimson, Xerces 1, and Xerces 2.
